InstalledItem.Name: HEX
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Seal Corporation
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Civilian

Prepare your ship for any circumstance by installing a HEX from Seal Corporation. Balanced performance and durability make this an ideal, versatile choice for those who don’t know where their next adventure may take them.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.

InstalledItem.Name: FoxFire
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Ace Astrogation
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Competition

The FoxFire won't leave a burning trail in your wake, but this quantum drive’s strong performance leaves an equal impression. Making it another elegant and powerful component from the folks at Ace Astrogation.

InstalledItem.Name: LightBlossom
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Sakura Sun
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Featuring stylish design and strong performance, the LightBlossom is a worthy addition to Sakura Sun’s line-up, continuing the reputation the conglomerate has for making everything and making it well.

InstalledItem.Name: Ping
InstalledItem.Description: Ping

InstalledItem.Name: Aegis Gladius - Decoy Launcher
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] Aegis Gladius - Decoy Launcher

InstalledItem.Name: Aegis Gladius - Decoy Launcher
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] Aegis Gladius - Decoy Launcher

InstalledItem.Name: BlastChill
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Civilian

The BlastChill is a consumer-grade cooler from Lightning Power Ltd. It keeps your ship running without straining its signature, but is best known for a much mocked 2945 ad campaign that promised it was “Built to bring the chill.”

InstalledItem.Name: Joker Defcon - Noise Launcher
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] Joker Defcon - Noise Launcher

InstalledItem.Name: Joker Defcon - Noise Launcher
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] Joker Defcon - Noise Launcher

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-221 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 2
Missiles: 2xS1

Behring’s MSD-221 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 2 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S1 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Spark I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 1

Those that believe size doesn’t matter would do well to stay clear of the Firestorm Kinetics Spark. Using cross section targeting, this lightweight proximity missile packs a considerable punch.

InstalledItem.Name: Spark I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 1

Those that believe size doesn’t matter would do well to stay clear of the Firestorm Kinetics Spark. Using cross section targeting, this lightweight proximity missile packs a considerable punch.

Size: 2

Behring’s MSD-221 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 2 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S1 missiles.

Those that believe size doesn’t matter would do well to stay clear of the Firestorm Kinetics Spark. Using cross section targeting, this lightweight proximity missile packs a considerable punch.

Size: 1

Those that believe size doesn’t matter would do well to stay clear of the Firestorm Kinetics Spark. Using cross section targeting, this lightweight proximity missile packs a considerable punch.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S2 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 2

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-117 Bulldog Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

Featuring a three-barrel sequential fire design, the Klaus & Werner CF-117 Bulldog laser repeater is capable of delivering high velocity energy rounds while maintaining heat efficiency making it a favorite among new pilots who are outfitting their first ship.
